footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Candace | Update Date: 10/03/2022 | Editor: Sew#2409

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: __Favonius Lance__ The Energy Recharge substat helps Candace meet her required energy threshold while the passive generates energy for the whole team.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Engulfing Lightning, The Catch, Black Tassel, Wavebreaker's Fin, Prototype Starglitter

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge or HP% |<goblet>  Hydro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  Crit Rate or Crit DMG

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Energy Recharge|Crit Rate or Crit DMG|HP%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide 
**2)** Elemental Skill: Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum 
**3)**  Normal Attack: Gleaming Spear - Guardian Stance

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: 4pc Instructors is only viable in teams that want the extra Elemental mastery.
